thread.title: Zlatan Ibrahimovic undecided on Man United future: He wants this to happen first
thread.title_full: Zlatan Ibrahimovic undecided on Man United future: He wants this to happen first

title: Zlatan Ibrahimovic undecided on Man United future: He wants this to happen first
text:
Zlatan Ibrahimovic undecided on Man United future: He wants this to happen first ZLATAN IBRAHIMOVIC has yet to make a decision on his Manchester United future, according to reports. PUBLISHED: 22:15, Mon, Feb 6, 2017 | UPDATED: 22:27, Mon, Feb 6, 2017 
Zlatan Ibrahimovic 's current contract expires at the end of the season, although he is expected to stay on for another year. 
Jose Mourinho is keen to trigger it so he can retain the services of his top striker. 
The Swede's agent, Mino Raiola, recently admitted his client could be tempted to move back to Serie A and join Napoli. GETTY Zlatan Ibrahimovic has yet to make a decision on his Manchester United future GETTY Jose Mourinho wants Zlatan Ibrahimovic to stay on Manchester United player ratings against Leicester Sun, February 5, 2017
